ingredients.ingredient: ¼ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
1 (16 ounce) package frozen cauliflower with broccoli and red pepper
ingredients.normalizedName: Frozen Cauliflower Broccoli Red Pepper Mix

cookingTips: Use parchment paper or foil to steam fish gently and retain moisture
Don't overcook tilapia as it becomes dry quickly; bake just until flesh is opaque
Serve immediately with fresh lemon for brightening the delicate flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through preparing a quick, healthy baked tilapia with minimal fat. Emphasize the simplicity and nutritional benefits of this lean protein.
